channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Volunteer litter pick bags ready for collection, 8th November
item.description:
Lay-by on the A40 between Wheatstone Inn and Liddington Road (before you go under the railway bridge) next to the litter bin. The 'What 3 Words' location is herb.closer.salad The ordnance survey map reference is: 51.87699, -2.197851 Council Litter Bin Ref: 0304

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Litter picking bags ready for collection

item.title: Yet more fly tipping., 8th November
item.description:
This is the THIRD TIME SINCE MONDAY that rubbish has been dumped here. Why does CBC do absolutely nothing to try and catch and prosecute those responsible for creating this eyesore? Fly tipping is a criminal offence. This location is a well known hot spot for fly tipping. Why not put up a covert camera, catch them and fine them?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Pates Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light permanently on, 8th November
item.description:
The light at the west end of Sixways car park, Cheltenham is permanently on PS Thereâ€™s no category for street lights that are permanently on

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 195, London Road, Cheltenham
